short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Organize your browser bookmarks and access them quickly anywhere.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Organize your bookmarks more effectively and streamline the process of importing and saving browser tabs into organized bookmark collections from anywhere.

Bookmarks Manager helps you get your work under control and finally feel organized. Use it to manage tabs and organize bookmarks. It allows you to switch contexts instantly, helping you stay focused on your work and saving time otherwise spent switching between websites, browser windows, or searching for unorganized bookmarks.

At a glance, you can see the contents of multiple bookmark collections within the same category and collapse those that aren't of interest.



Features:

✨ Session & Tab Management: Bookmark your open tabs or entire browser window as a bookmark collection within Spaces, to keep everything organized and quickly accessible at any time. Easily rearrange and restore browser sessions or individual bookmarks if needed.

✨ Spaces & Bookmark Categories: Organize your work by projects using Spaces as different main categories, and group your bookmarks within these Spaces to streamline context switching, making it easy to open or close all related tabs with a single click.

✨ Drag and Drop: The drag-and-drop feature is available throughout the extension, allowing you to effortlessly rearrange groups, move existing bookmarks, or add open tabs to bookmark collections.

✨ Efficient Search: Find your Bookmarks and Groups instantly with a powerful search feature that filters results directly inside your Spaces and Bookmark Collections.

✨ Quick Access Bookmarks: Pin the extension to the browser toolbar and click on it to open a mini version panel within the same window, allowing you to quickly access your bookmarks.

✨ Sync & Reach Everywhere: Sync your bookmarks across multiple devices by enabling bookmark sync in your browser settings, ensuring your work stays organized and accessible no matter where you are.

✨ Data Ownership: Your bookmarks remains completely under your control, with nothing stored or processed externally.

✨ Personalization: Customize your experience by choosing your theme, including light/dark mode, and color options to personalize the user interface to your liking.



WHY BOOKMARKS MANAGER?

The key advantage of Bookmarks Manager is that it requires no sign-in and ensures complete data ownership.
You can use it without creating an account, and your data and bookmarks stay fully under your control, with nothing stored or shared with third parties or external servers.

Bookmarks Manager is just a visualization tool, that organizes your bookmarks/favorites already stored locally in your browser. It also offers various features to help you manage your bookmarks more efficiently and boost productivity.

You can effortlessly access, organize, and manage your saved pages and sites across multiple devices, by enabling bookmark sync in your browser settings.
